gui
Class SequencePanel.YesNo

java.lang.Object
  gui.SequencePanel.YesNo
Enclosing class:
SequencePanel
protected class SequencePanel.YesNo
extends java.lang.Object

A radio button pair with the buttons labeled as "yes" and "no" in the respective language. The buttons are added to a ButtonGroup so that only one or the other can be selected at a time.

Author:
Joakim Reinert

Method Detail

isYes

public boolean isYes()
Returns whether yes is selected or not

Returns:
- true if yes is selected, false otherwise

setYes

public void setYes(boolean b)
Sets yes or no as selected (depending on the given boolean)

Parameters:
b - - if true, yes is selected (and no deselected), if false it's the other way around
